heading: Season 5 PTR Day 1 Recap
content: What's new on the Diablo 4 Season 5 PTR running since yesterday? Let's dive in together through all the news and some thoughts about this PTR patch with our Season 5 PTR Day 1 Recap! Pit Bosses currently have way more HP than normal. This is a known issue: is currently blasting the Season 5 PTR to test all the changes and update our guides! With that said, head over to our and select the to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 4 experience! Written by:
